EmailTemplate.description: Notification to requestor that the developer sandbox request has been created
EmailTemplate.name: Development Sandbox Request Form Approved Admin Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Development Sandbox Has Been Approved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your new sandbox is ready for use. {!Forms__c.Submitted_on_Behalf_Of__c} is the Delegated Administrator.
The following url will take you to your new sandbox: {!Forms__c.SandboxURL__c}
If you have an EPA LAN ID/PIV, you can login using those by clicking ‘EPA Login’.
The Application Deployment Guide (ADG) addresses common tasks. For example, Section 4 of the ADG addresses User Administration and will help the Delegated Administrator activate users and assign permissions for their sandbox. https://usepa.sharepoint.com/sites/oei_Community/BAP/Shared%20Documents/
If you have any questions or need assistance, please contact BAP at BAP-Request@epa.gov
Thank You, BAP Admins
